entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kirkland Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:39 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.8°C

Humidity: 72 %

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
